title: Chaos

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Frame a player at night.
- Check for a player's exact role at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A framed player's visitors will become doused.
- Framed players will return unfavorable results to all Investigatives (appear as a random evil to the Consigliere, show up evil in Psychic results, etc.)
- If you find a kill-capable player with your investigations, they will become doused.
- If the Apocalypse dies, you will be promoted to Apocalypase.
